data.oai_dc:dc: MAEC, Agri-environment measures, Wallonia, Plantae, Lepidoptera, Magnoliophyta, Agriculture, Occurrence, Natura 2000

This Lepidoptera and angispermae occurrences dataset was compiled by the non-profit association Natagriwal (https://www.natagriwal.be/). The data were collected in plots of agri-environmental measures or during restoration of Natura 2000 habitats in Wallonia, between 1988 and 2017.|34,968 occurrences
